title: Social Welfare Act 2012 (No. 43 of 2012)) of the Social Welfare Consolidation
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Social Welfare (Section 290A)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Social Welfare (Section 290A) 

(Agreement) Order 2024. 

Budgeting in relation to certain rent payments
text_norm: 1 order may cited social welfare (section 290a) (agreement) order 2024 budgeting relation certain rent payment

title: Social Welfare Act 2012 (No. 43 of 2012)) of the Social Welfare Consolidation
heading: 2. For the purposes of section 290A(3) (inserted by section 15 of the Social
text_raw:
2. For the purposes of section 290A(3) (inserted by section 15 of the Social 
Welfare Act 2012 (No. 43 of 2012)) of the Social Welfare Consolidation Act 
2005 (No. 26 of 2005), it is specified that the Minister for Social Protection has 
entered into an agreement with An Post, and the period for which that agreement 
has effect is the period beginning on 1 January 2025 and ending on 31 December

title: Social Welfare Act 2012 (No. 43 of 2012)) of the Social Welfare Consolidation
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

Section 15 of the Social Welfare Act 2012 extended the Household Budgeting 
facility for social welfare recipients by introducing new provisions specific to 
local authority rents. Under these provisions a new household budgeting 
arrangement was introduced whereby tenants of a housing authority or housing 
body who are in receipt of a social welfare payment could agree to have a portion 
of their social welfare payment withheld and paid to a local authority in respect 
of their rent. 

The Social Welfare (Section 290A) (Agreement) Order 2024 specifies that the 
Minister for Social Protection has entered into an agreement with An Post for 
the purposes of carrying out this household budgeting arrangement and that this 
agreement will have effect from 1 January 2025 to 31 December 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [631]
